DOC.brief_title: A Multicenter Study Comparing Efficacy , Safety Tolerability Oral Dydrogesterone 30 mg Daily Versus Intravaginal Micronized Progesterone Capsules 600 mg Daily Luteal Support In-Vitro Fertilization
